text:
WEDNESDAY    THURSDAY    FRIDAY    SATURDAY

bomiler@mccollage  
Passive?  
National Geographic Learning  

Passive  
- denning or relating to a  
voice of verbs in which the subject  
undergoes the action of the verb  

Active  
- describes a sentence  
where the subject performs the  
action stated by the verb  

> TAKE  
> IT UNTIL YOU BECOME IT  
> AMY CUDDY  
> - TED
